document_data.name: Skarn Brassaxe
document_data.mainbody:
'''Skarn Brassaxe''' was a [[dwarven]] commander that committed his forces to the [[Army of the North]], in order to combat the threat of the [[Shadovar]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|It's bright enough to blind [[Lathander]]. Are you all this stupid, or are you fools trying to light yourselves up for enemy long-casters?|Skarn, to his fellow commanders of the allied army.}}
document_data.History: In [[Mirtul]] of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Skarn, his dwarves, and the rest of the Army of the North ''[[teleportation circle|teleported]]'' from the [[Forest of Wyrms]] to the [[Shaeradim]], just outside the [[Shadovar]]-crafted [[shadowshell]].
